DOC.brief_summary: To comprehensively characterize Left Ventricular ( LV ) remodel Myocardial Infarction ( MI ) community , study association pattern remodel biological pathway examine association predictor remodel heart failure Myocardial Infarction .
DOC.brief_title: Ventricular Remodeling Heart Failure After Myocardial Infarction : A Community Study
DOC.criteria: 1 . Hospitalized patient clinical diagnosis Myocardial Infarction . 2 . Residents Olmsted , Dodge , Goodhue , Wabasha , Winona , Fillmore Mower Counties . 3 . Able provide inform consent . 1 . Previous clinical diagnosis Myocardial Infarction 2 . Previous diagnosis Heart Failure and/or Cardiomyopathy 3 . Diagnosis Apical Ballooning Syndrome 4 . Planned Coronary Artery Bypass Graft ( CABG ) index hospitalization 5 . Unable provide inform consent
